channel.title: Environment on DYREHAUGEN
channel.description: Recent content in Environment on DYREHAUGEN

item.title: The Curse of Development
item.description: There exists a well-known Swedish song from my childhood. It begins like this: Lyckliga gatan, du finns inte mere Du er f√∂rsvinnen med hela kvarteret ... In English the meaning would be: Oh Happy Street of my Childhild you no more exits You are now gone together with the whole quarter ... The lyrics profondly catches the sorry mood of someone experiencing the arrival of the ‘Development Machine’ in their neigbourhood.
